assembly-file-versioning-format.description: Specifies the format of AssemblyFileVersion and overwrites the value of assembly-file-versioning-scheme.

assembly-file-versioning-scheme.description: The scheme to use when setting AssemblyFileVersion attribute. Can be 'MajorMinorPatchTag', 'MajorMinorPatch', 'MajorMinor', 'Major', 'None'.

assembly-informational-format.description: Specifies the format of AssemblyInformationalVersion. The default value is {InformationalVersion}.

assembly-versioning-format.description: Specifies the format of AssemblyVersion and overwrites the value of assembly-versioning-scheme.

assembly-versioning-scheme.description: The scheme to use when setting AssemblyVersion attribute. Can be 'MajorMinorPatchTag', 'MajorMinorPatch', 'MajorMinor', 'Major', 'None'.

branches.description: The header for all the individual branch configuration.

commit-date-format.description: The format to use when calculating the commit date. Defaults to 'yyyy-MM-dd'.

ignore.description: The header property for the ignore configuration.

major-version-bump-message.description: The regular expression to match commit messages with to perform a major version increment. Default set to '\+semver:\s?(breaking|major)'

merge-message-formats.description: Custom merge message formats to enable identification of merge messages that do not follow the built-in conventions.

minor-version-bump-message.description: The regular expression to match commit messages with to perform a minor version increment. Default set to '\+semver:\s?(feature|minor)'

next-version.description: Allows you to bump the next version explicitly. Useful for bumping main or a feature branch with breaking changes

no-bump-message.description: Used to tell GitVersion not to increment when in Mainline development mode. . Default set to '\+semver:\s?(none|skip)'

patch-version-bump-message.description: The regular expression to match commit messages with to perform a patch version increment. Default set to '\+semver:\s?(fix|patch)'

semantic-version-format.description: Specifies the semantic version format that is used when parsing the string. Can be 'Strict' or 'Loose'.

tag-prefix.description: A regular expression which is used to trim Git tags before processing. Defaults to [vV]?

tag-pre-release-weight.description: The pre-release weight in case of tagged commits. Defaults to 60000.

update-build-number.description: Whether to update the build number in the project file. Defaults to true.

version-in-branch-pattern.description: A regular expression which is used to determine the version number in the branch name or commit message (e.g., v1.0.0-LTS). The default value is '(?<version>[vV]?\d+(\.\d+)?(\.\d+)?).*'.

workflow.description: The base template of the configuration to use. Possible values are: GitFlow/v1 or GitHubFlow/v1

Nullable\u00601.description: Sets whether it should be possible to increment the version with special syntax in the commit message. Can be 'Disabled', 'Enabled' or 'MergeMessageOnly'.

IncrementStrategy.description: The increment strategy for this branch. Can be 'Inherit', 'Patch', 'Minor', 'Major', 'None'.

Nullable\u006011.description: When using Mainline mode, this indicates that this branch is a mainline. By default main and support/* are mainlines.

Nullable\u006012.description: Indicates this branch configuration represents a release branch in GitFlow.

array.description: The branches that this branch is a source branch.

items.description: The branches that this branch is a source branch.

string.description: The label to use for this branch. Use the value {BranchName} or similar as a placeholder to insert a named capture group from RegularExpression (fx. the branch name).

string1.description: The regular expression pattern to use to extract the number from the branch name. Defaults to '[/-](?<number>\d+)[-/]'.

Nullable\u006013.description: Provides a way to translate the PreReleaseLabel to a number.

Nullable\u006014.description: Prevent increment of merged branch version.

string2.description: The regular expression pattern to use to match this branch.

array1.description: The source branches for this branch.

items.description: The source branches for this branch.

Nullable\u006015.description: This property is a branch related property and gives the user the possibility to control the behavior of whether the merge commit message will be interpreted as a next version or not.

Nullable\u006016.description: Strategy which will look for tagged merge commits directly off the current branch.

Nullable\u006017.description: Indicates this branch configuration represents develop in GitFlow.

Nullable\u006018.description: The versioning mode for this branch. Can be 'ContinuousDelivery', 'ContinuousDeployment', 'Mainline'.

Nullable\u006019.description: Commits before this date will be ignored. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.

array2.description: A sequence of SHAs to be excluded from the version calculations.

items.description: A sequence of SHAs to be excluded from the version calculations.
